text: is a Japanese footballer who plays as a midfielder for Mito HollyHock in J2 League. He has previously played for both Nagoya Grampus and Gamba Osaka. ==Career== ===Nagoya Grampus=== Mori made his official debut for Nagoya Grampus in the J. League Division 1, J. League Cup on 19 March 2014 against Ventforet Kofu in Mizuho Athletic Stadium in Nagoya, Japan. He started the match and was subbed out in the 67th minute replaced by Ryota Aoki.
